Articles.Content:
Hi, my name is TomSawyer2112, and from my username, my favorite band is the Canadian rock band, Rush.

I have been playing KSP since June 2014 when I got a new PC that was up to spec for next-gen gaming. I have been brought to this game partially by it's popularity on Steam, and my interests in space sciences and astronomy after receiving a recognition of achievement award at my local college in the same year.

whell hello,

my name is JWOC, i have played KSP since June of 2014 as have you. i hope that being a member of this forum will help you better understand the game and allow you to ask for help

Happy Launchings,

JWOC

Hello TomSawyer2112, and welcome to the forums!

I'm always pleased to welcome another Canadian into our community. And it's definitely pleasing to see a Rush fan. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Welcome! I too am new.

Always great to see a rush fan

And welcome to you too, Sesquinox!

Happy landings!

So many Canadians! Where are the Americans at?!
Also, welcome and enjoy your stay.

Welcome, TomSawyer2112!
Also, I, too, am Canadian.

Invasion of the Canadians.
Also, thanks, Starhawk! I kinda lurked around hear and mostly used the subreddit. Then I thought, "Hey, this is cool."
